tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dual_citizenship_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    citizenship_country_1 VARCHAR(50),
    citizenship_country_2 VARCHAR(50),
    regulations TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dual_citizenship_status (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   person_id INT,
   citizenship_country1 VARCHAR(255),
   citizenship_country2 VARCHAR(255),
   status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE dual_citizenship_status (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  citizenship1 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  citizenship2 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE citizenship_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  regulation TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE person (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE dual_citizenship_info (
  person_id INT,
  status_id INT,
  reg_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES dual_citizenship_status(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (reg_id) REFERENCES citizenship_regulations(id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
